    • Method Detail

      • getAccountDetails

        @Get
public Response<Account> getAccountDetails(Subject subject)
        Lighter Endpoint-Method for retrieving account details. Responds to HTTP-GET requests
        This method takes no parameters from the request. Instead, it depends on a Subject RequestGuard to provide details on the subject making the request. If the subject is anonymous (not signed-in), this method responds with a 401 Unauthorized response.
        Otherwise, the method responds with the Subject's Account. If the account does not exist, a new one is silently created and saved in the repository.
        Parameters:
        subject - An authenticated Subject request guard
        Returns:
        the Subject's Account as a JSON response or an error (in the Subject is not authenticated)
